thread.title: Dan ODonnell
thread.title_full: Hack Repair Website Security Services, USA, Call (619) 479-6637 | We Fix Hacked Websites reviewed by Dan ODonnell

author: Dan ODonnell
title: Dan ODonnell
text:
He's done it again - cleaned up and restored a very-compromised site for one of our clients. My company is a small web development firm with 100+ clients. Hack Repair has been exceptionally quick on a couple occasions - in both cases it took less than 6 hours from initial contact until the site had all repairs in place! And the follow-up petitioning Google to remove the "this site may have been hacked" message worked within a couple days.
Many thanks, I recommend the service 110%.
